item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo Compartment Smoke Detection System (Forward, Aft) – Flight Deck Test System Empty Cargo Handling Equipment Only

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures are established and used to verify associated cargo compartments remain empty, or contain only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.

numlitem.para: Associated cargo compartments remain empty or contain only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "LOWER LOBE COMP SMOKE DET SYS INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
